document.docAuthor: Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail, Akkari, Nesrine & Zapparoli, Marzio
document.masterDocTitle: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

subSubSection.paragraph:
( 14 )
Lithobius ( Lithobius ) viriatus Sseliwanoff, 1878
:
Zapparoli, 2002
: 39 , Fig. 18 .

General distribution. Europe: Albania , Bulgaria , Greece (incl. Crete), Italy , Ukraine . West Asia: Caucasus, Iran , Israel , Jordan , Turkey (
Zapparoli 2002
; Minelli et al. 2006 ).

New records from Peloponnisos (
Fig. 6
).
1 ♂
, 2 ♀♀, Argolida, Mt Didimon (Ligourio), 600–1000 m ,
3 Jun. 2005
, G. Osella.

Ecological notes. 30–2400 m ; a woodland species, in
Abies cephalonica
and
Fagus sylvatica
woods, in montane open habitats, in caves, and in agroecosystems (
Verhoeff 1899
;
Dobroruka 1965
; Zapparoli 1994 , 1996 ).
